Title.Language: Psalm 98 - The Lord reigned; let the people rage...

Text.Language: The Lord reigned; let the people rage; He who sits upon the cherubim, let the earth be shaken. The Lord is great in Zion, and is high over all peoples. Let them confess His great name, for it is fearsome and holy, and the King's honor loves the judgment. You have prepared uprightness; You have made judgment and justice in Jacob. Exalt the Lord our God, and worship at His footstool; for He is holy.

Moses and Aaron among His priests, and Samuel among those who call upon His name; they called upon the Lord, and He heard them. He spoke to them in a pillar of cloud, for they kept His testimonies and the ordinances which He gave them. O Lord our God, You answered them; O God, You became for them a forgiver and an avenger over all their deeds. Exalt you the Lord our God, and worship at His holy mountain, for the Lord our God is holy. ALLELUIA.
